### Overview

This course introduces Loupe Browser for the visualization and analysis of single cell data.

The course consists of 1 section in which we will cover all the main features of Loupe Browser including visualizing data sets, performing differntial analysis, reviewing QC and more. Each section is presented as HTML presentations or single page document. Exercises and answer sheets are included after all subsections to practice techniques and provide future reference examples.

Course material and exercises are available to view as rendered HTML at https://rockefelleruniversity.github.io/LoupeBrowser/.
All material is available to download under GPL v2 license.
